headline: Nvidia hits $4T, Microsoft upgraded, Hims & Hers in Canada
summary: Microsoft (MSFT) stock gets a boost after Oppenheimer upgraded the stock to Outperform from Market Perform and set a $600 price target, highlighting underappreciated artificial intelligence (AI) potential and Azure growth in 2026.

headline: Is Microsoft Stock A Buy In July? What The Fundamentals, Chart Say As MSFT Aims At 7th Straight Weekly Gain
summary: Microsoft stock remains one of the 'Magnificent Seven' tech giants with 7.43 billion shares outstanding and a market value of nearly $3.7 trillion. The stock also notched a new all-time high for the sixth straight week, marking impressive momentum.

headline: Nvidia's $4T market cap: How it reached the milestone
